review.description: Great place. Just stumbled upon it today. Good quality, fresh food. I got the raw salmon poke bowl and it was great. Place is clean, well lit and the guys working there were very nice. I highly recommend!
review.author: Steven S.

review.description: I've been at least 5 times since it opened can't get enough! Amazingly fresh fish with the best toppings. Really well priced for the amount of food you're getting. The bento options are also delicious and extremely filling. Definitely a fast and healthy meal--so happy they're in BK!
review.author: Lisa X.

review.description: So tasty!! Portions were quite large. Sure to make you full. ((Burp))  Will definitely go back!
review.author: Pea T.
